description: Simulated Annealing based batch scheduling optimizer that uses ordering and batching heuristics to generate competitive solutions.

initial_temperature.description: Starting temperature for the simulated annealing process.

final_temperature.description: Ending temperature for the simulated annealing process.

cooling_rate.description: Cooling rate (multiplier) applied to the temperature at each iteration.

iterations_per_temp.description: Number of iterations to perform at each temperature level.
